bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXXIV (Nos 5404-5476)
bibl.seg: A. Benaissa, N. Gonis, W.B. Henry & M. Langellotti, with contributions by H. Bernsdorff, W.E.H. Cockle, D. Colomo, C. D'Agostino, T.M. Hickey, E. Nabney, E.E. Prodi, E.F. Rossetti, S. Slattery, O. Thomas, G. Ucciardello, J. Whitehorne, H. Whitehouse, A. Winkler, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXXIV (Nos 5404-5476) = Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 105.
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2019, xii-278 pp., figg., 22 pll. ISBN 978-0-85698-246-0. Â£85.

P. Oxy. LXXXIV, 5404-5476. - P. v: Preface (A.B.). - I. Septuagint (5404-5408). - II. New Literary & Subliterary Texts (5409-5414). - III. Apollonius Rhodius (5415-5431). - IV. Documentary Texts (5432-5475) [including documents from the dossier of the 'Apion estate', 5453-5474]. - V. Painting (5476).
